invocation.name: Belsirasin's Tears I
invocation.description: Causes subject to shed a tear for every lie told. Lasts for a conversation.

invocation.name: Mirytha's Shade I
invocation.description: Offers insight into the reason a ghost haunts a locale or is cuasing trouble. The priest is then compelled to help the ghost find its way to the next plane of existence.

invocation.name: Peace of Valon I
invocation.description: Creates a spherical zone around the priest within which all sapients are disinclined to fight. Lasts until sleep.

invocation.name: Maermal's Strength I
invocation.description: Increases the subject's strength by one point for every twenty rolled on the invocation. It lasts until sleep. If the subject harms someone, the bonus becomes a penalty after the harm has been done.

invocation.name: Tirrala's Cure I
invocation.description: Gives subject touched an immediate healing roll, at a bonus of one fifth the invocation roll.
